Package it.uninsubria.client.controller.homepage.categories

Class CategoryDetailController

java.lang.Object
it.uninsubria.client.controller.ControllerBase
it.uninsubria.client.controller.homepage.categories.CategoryDetailController
All Implemented Interfaces:
LanguageManager.LanguageChangeListener, ParametrizedController, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CategoryDetailController extends ControllerBase implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, ParametrizedController
Controller for the detailed category view that displays books within a specific category. Provides search, sorting, and filtering functionality for category books.

This controller manages:

  • Loading and displaying books for a specific category
  • Search functionality within the category
  • Sorting options (by title, author, year)
  • Adding books to user libraries
  • Navigation to individual book details

Performance optimizations include:

  • Caching of category books
  • Asynchronous loading
  • Virtualized list view with fixed cell size
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Book Recommender Team

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)

    • initData

      public void initData(Map<String,Object> params)
      Initializes the controller with parameters passed from the navigation system. Expects a "category" parameter containing the category name to display.
      Specified by:
      initData in interface ParametrizedController
      Parameters:
      params - a map containing initialization parameters, must include "category" key

    • setCategory

      public void setCategory(String categoryName)
      Sets the current category to display and loads its books. Resets cache if switching to a different category.
      Parameters:
      categoryName - the name of the category to display

    • setupUI

      private void setupUI()
      Sets up the user interface components and event handlers. Initializes buttons, search fields, combo boxes, and list views.

    • initializeUITexts

      private void initializeUITexts()
      Initialize UI texts with localized strings

    • loadCategoryBooks

      private void loadCategoryBooks()
      Loads books for the current category from the server. Uses caching to avoid unnecessary network requests. Books are loaded asynchronously to prevent UI blocking.
